Description:
CANNONEER: Jolly interesting isn't it?! 
DOCTOR: It's dark. Darkness is much the same everywhere. 
CANNONEER: The ways people have adapted to the deeps - 'salting', is it? - remarkable! Why, take Hideaway for instance -
DOCTOR: I'd rather not. We should leave the dark, and the things that dwell in it, well alone.
Name: Overheard at Zee: The Dark is Rising
